strategy: Questoris Mechanicus armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. In addition, all Knight Banner formations are subject to the 'Bravery' special rule.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Questoris Mechanicus of the Adeptus Mechancius

sections.name: Core Banners
sections.description: Up to one Dominus Banner for each Questoris Banner

formations.name: Questoris
formations.units: Two Questoris Knight-Paladins, Crusaders, Errants, Wardens or Gallants. May not mix configurations
extraUnits: (0-1 in the army) Replace the Seneschal in the formation with a Lord Seneschal: 50 points
Add one Questoris Knight of the same configuration: 125 points
Add one Twin Icarus Autocannon to each Questoris Knight in a formation with Knight-Paladins, Crusaders or Errants: 25 points

sections.name: Recon Banners
sections.description: Up to one Recon Banner for each Core Banner

formations.name: Cerastus
extraUnits: Add one Cerastus Knight of the same configuration: 150 points

formations.name: Armiger
extraUnits: Add one Armiger Knight of the same configuration: 50 points
Add one Knight-Preceptor with a Seneschal: 175 points

sections.name: Relic Banners
sections.description: Up to one Relic Banner for each part of 1500 points in the army.

formations.name: Questoris Reliquae
formations.units: One Seneschal, one Questoris Relic Knight-Styrix or Knight-Magaera
extraUnits: Add one Questoris Relic Knight of the same configuration: 150 points

formations.name: Cerastus Reliquae
formations.units: One Seneschal, one Cerastus Relic Knight-Atrapos

formations.name: Acastus Reliquae
formations.units: One Seneschal, one Acastus Relic Knight-Porphyrion or Knight-Asterius
extraUnits: Add one Acastus Relic Knight of the same configuaration: 225 points

sections.name: Mechanicus Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Forge World allies.

formations.name: Skitarii Maniple
extraUnits: Replace the Gorgon with five Skorpius Duneriders: Free

formations.name: Onager Maniple
formations.units: One Onager Dunecrawler with Icarus Array, three Onager Dunecrawlers with another single configuration

upgrades.title: Questoris Mechanicus Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Add one Seneschal to the formation
